languages.text: "Клад и секрет. Технология — это проявление божественности Омниссии в мире. Потому непосвященные имеют право прикасаться лишь к самым тривиальным и вульгарным ее проявлениям. Мы же допущены к священному катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания".

traits.locale_text: "Клад и секрет. Технология — это проявление божественности Омниссии в мире. Потому непосвященные обыватели имеют право прикасаться лишь к самым тривиальным и вульгарным ее проявлениям. Мы же допущены к катехизису обслуживания и эксплуатации, составленному в соответствии с {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Шестнадцатью Универсальными Законами{/g}".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."
languages.original_text: "Клад и секрет. Технология — это проявление божественности Омниссии в мире. Потому непосвященные имеют право прикасаться лишь к самым тривиальным и вульгарным ее проявлениям. Мы же допущены к священному катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания".

traits.locale_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why uninitiated laymen may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. On the other hand, we are authorized to use the catechism of maintenance and operation complied in accordance with the {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Sixteen Universal Laws{/g}".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

We, on the other hand, are authorized to use the catechism of maintenance and operation compiled in accordance with the {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Sixteen Universal Laws{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. traits.locale_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated laity may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the catechism of maintenance and operation compiled in accordance with the ancient laws of Mars."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es al mismo tiempo un tesoro y un secreto. La tecnología es el modo en que la divinidad del Omnissiah se manifiesta en este mundo. Por eso a los no iniciados solo se les permite tocar las más vulgares y mundanas de sus instancias. Nosotros, por otro lado, estamos autorizados a usar el Sagrado Catecismo de Operación y Mantenimiento».
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: «Es al mismo tiempo un tesoro y un secreto. La tecnología es el modo en que la divinidad del Omnissiah se manifiesta en este mundo. Por eso a los no iniciados solo se les permite tocar las más vulgares y mundanas de sus instancias. Nosotros, por otro lado, estamos autorizados a usar el Sagrado Catecismo de Operación y Mantenimiento».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それは財宝でもあり、秘密でもある。万機神の神性は技術を通してこの世界に存在している。そのため、不慣れな者はもっとも低俗で凡庸な事例に触れることしか許されないのだ。一方、我々は整備と操作の要理に触れる権利が与えられている」
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: 「それは財宝でもあり、秘密でもある。万機神の神性は技術を通してこの世界に存在している。そのため、不慣れな者はもっとも低俗で凡庸な事例に触れることしか許されないのだ。一方、我々は整備と操作の要理に触れる権利が与えられている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “它既是宝藏，也是秘密。技术是欧姆尼塞亚在这个世界上的化身。正因如此，教外人士通常只允许触摸它最粗糙、最世俗的实例。至于我们，我们则被授权，践行操作与维护的教义。”
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: “它既是宝藏，也是秘密。技术是欧姆尼塞亚在这个世界上的化身。正因如此，教外人士通常只允许触摸它最粗糙、最世俗的实例。至于我们，我们则被授权，践行操作与维护的教义。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est à la fois un trésor et un secret. La technologie est la voie par laquelle la divinité de l'Omnimessie se manifeste en ce monde. C'est pour cette raison que les non-initiés ne peuvent toucher que ses incarnations les plus vulgaires et les plus ordinaires. En ce qui nous concerne, nous sommes autorisés à utiliser le Catéchisme sacré de l'Entretien et de l'Exploitation. »
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: « C'est à la fois un trésor et un secret. La technologie est la voie par laquelle la divinité de l'Omnimessie se manifeste en ce monde. C'est pour cette raison que les non-initiés ne peuvent toucher que ses incarnations les plus vulgaires et les plus ordinaires. En ce qui nous concerne, nous sommes autorisés à utiliser le Catéchisme sacré de l'Entretien et de l'Exploitation. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist sowohl ein Schatz als auch ein Geheimnis. Durch Technologie manifestiert sich die Göttlichkeit des Omnissiah in dieser Welt. Daher kann es Nichteingeweihten nur gestattet werden, ihre vulgärsten und trivialsten Instanzen zu berühren. Wir dagegen sind autorisiert, den heiligen Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung durchzuführen."
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist sowohl ein Schatz als auch ein Geheimnis. Durch Technologie manifestiert sich die Göttlichkeit des Omnissiah in dieser Welt. Daher kann es Nichteingeweihten nur gestattet werden, ihre vulgärsten und trivialsten Instanzen zu berühren. Wir dagegen sind autorisiert, den heiligen Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung durchzuführen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

languages.text: "Aslında hem hazine hem de sırdır. Teknoloji, Hermesih'in bu dünyadaki dışa vurumudur. Bu nedenledir ki konuya hâkim olmayanların yalnızca en ilkel ve kullanım alanı en kısıtlı teknolojilere dokunmasına izin verilir. Öte yandan bizim, Kutsal Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli'ni kullanmaya iznimiz vardır."
languages.original_text: "It is both a treasure and a secret. Technology is how the divinity of the Omnissiah manifests itself in this world. This is why the uninitiated may only be allowed to touch the most vulgar and mundane of its instances. We, on the other hand, are authorised to use the Sacred Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: "Hem bir hazine hem de bir sırdır. Teknoloji, Hermesih'in bu dünyadaki dışa vurumudur. Bu nedenledir ki konuya hâkim olmayanların yalnızca en ilkel ve kullanım alanı en kısıtlı olanlara dokunmasına izin verilir. Öte yandan bizim, Kutsal Faaliyet ve Bakım İlmihâli'ni kullanmaya iznimiz vardır."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
